sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Wednesday, with over 243,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 47,000.
Shares of PKB were up about 0.8% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Wednesday were Lowes Companies ( LOW ), trading up about 0.8% with over 2.4 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Home Depot ( HD ), up about 1.3% on volume of over 2.2 million shares.

The Babcock & Wilcox ( BWC ) is the component faring the best Wednesday, up by about 3.1% on the day, while Martin Marietta Materials ( MLM ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF, trading lower by about 0.9%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
